medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in her usual state of health until ___ when she noted abdominal pain and nausea/vomiting after eating scallops for dinner. She had intermittent episodes of vomiting overnight with resolution of symptoms the following morning. After ___ days without recurrence, she experienced additional right upper quadrant/epigastric pain, nausea/vomiting, and loose stools after eating fish for dinner on ___.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, GERD, psoriasis, carpal tunnel syndrome, history of cellulitis, history of leg cramping
medical_history.family_history: Significant for coronary artery disease, hypertension, cerebrovascular accident.
